mapper.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.code as code, t.icon as icon, t.state as state, t.parent_id as parentId, t.name as name, t.sort as sort, s.name as parentName, t.url as url, t.concurrency_version, t.create_date AS createDate, t.update_date AS updateDate, t.create_person_id AS createPersonId, t.create_person_name AS createPersonName, t.update_person_id AS updatePersonId, t.update_person_name AS updatePersonName, t.create_org_id AS createOrgId, t.create_org_name AS createOrgName, t.create_company_id AS createCompanyId, t.create_company_name AS createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version AS concurrencyVersion, t.delflag AS delflag FROM oa_sys_link_center t LEFT JOIN oa_sys_link_center s on t.parent_id=s.id where t.delflag=0 ORDER BY t.sort

select sort from oa_sys_link_center t where 1=1
and t.parent_id=#{_parameter}
and t.parent_id is null
order by t.sort desc limit 1
SELECT c.parent_id as parentId, GROUP_CONCAT(c.name) as cName, GROUP_CONCAT(c.url) as cUrl, GROUP_CONCAT(c.id) as cId FROM oa_sys_link_center c GROUP BY c.parent_id ORDER BY c.sort

SELECT t.id as id, t.code as code, t.prefix_id as prefixId, t.icon as icon, t.parent_id as parentId, t.state as state, t.name as name, t.sort as sort, s.name as parentName, t.url as url, t.concurrency_version, t.create_date AS createDate, t.update_date AS updateDate, t.create_person_id AS createPersonId, t.create_person_name AS createPersonName, t.update_person_id AS updatePersonId, t.update_person_name AS updatePersonName, t.create_org_id AS createOrgId, t.create_org_name AS createOrgName, t.create_company_id AS createCompanyId, t.create_company_name AS createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version AS concurrencyVersion, t.delflag AS delflag FROM oa_sys_link_center t LEFT JOIN oa_sys_link_center s on t.parent_id=s.id where t.delflag=0 and t.state=1
and t.parent_id= #{_parameter}
and t.parent_id is null
ORDER BY t.sort

SELECT t.id as id, t.code as code, t.icon as icon, t.parent_id as parentId, t.state as state, t.name as name, t.sort as sort, s.name as parentName, t.url as url, t.concurrency_version, t.create_date AS createDate, t.update_date AS updateDate, t.create_person_id AS createPersonId, t.create_person_name AS createPersonName, t.update_person_id AS updatePersonId, t.update_person_name AS updatePersonName, t.create_org_id AS createOrgId, t.prefix_id as prefixId, t.create_org_name AS createOrgName, t.create_company_id AS createCompanyId, t.create_company_name AS createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version AS concurrencyVersion, t.delflag AS delflag FROM oa_sys_link_center t LEFT JOIN oa_sys_link_center s on t.parent_id=s.id where t.delflag=0
